response:
MRI is the gold standard to confirm demyelination and identify lesions. Lumbar puncture is required for oligoclonal bands (MS) and to rule out infection. Blood tests are necessary to exclude mimics (NMO, Sarcoidosis, Vasculitis) and assess the active respiratory issue.
